services.title: What does DRK LAB do?
services.description: DRK LAB blends a rental warehouse with a 3D lab. We spot real on-set problems and design specific parts so they stop being problems.

items.title: 3D design for shoots
items.text: Parts built for everyday work: protections, caps, mounts, adapters and solutions you won't find in manufacturers' catalogues.

items.title: Printing with technical materials
items.text: High-quality PLA, fibre-reinforced compounds and materials made to handle impacts, heat and on-set abuse.

items.title: Rapid prototyping for rentals and production
items.text: From problem to functional part in a few days, with fast iterations until the fit is perfect.

featured.title: Featured products
featured.description: A selection of parts already working daily in rentals and crews.

custom.description: Need a specific part for a camera, monitor or light? DRK LAB can design and manufacture a solution tailored to your workflow.
items: · Adapters and mounts for cameras and accessories.

about.title: Who's behind DRK LAB?
about.description: DRK LAB is the personal project of Fran, an audiovisual technician and cinematographer. Working daily with cameras, lenses and lights in a rental, I've seen first-hand what breaks, what's lost and what's missing in the cases. That's where DRK LAB parts come from: small solutions solving very specific problems.

contact.title: Contact
contact.description: If you're a rental, production company or freelance technician and have an idea or on-set problem, write me and let's talk.
contact.tagline: Built in Catalonia for shoots everywhere.

drk-cap-led.name: Bowens caps for LED heads
drk-cap-led.shortDescription: Protective caps for Bowens LED heads (Aputure, Forza, SmallRig...). They protect the COB during transport and storage.
drk-cap-led.longDescription: Protective caps designed specifically for LED heads with Bowens mount. Precise fit, soft interior, and an option to customize with the rental or production logo. Built to withstand cases, vans, and intensive shoot schedules.
features: Compatible with standard Bowens mount
Optional custom logo
Design aimed at rental and heavy transport
Impact- and scratch-resistant material

technicalSpecs.label: Tested models
technicalSpecs.value: Aputure 300d II/600d, Nanlite Forza 300B II, SmallRig RC 220

drk-cap-led.notes: Initial batches already in use at rentals.

drk-case-media.name: Cases for SD / CFexpress / CFast cards
drk-case-media.shortDescription: Compact, robust cases for SD, CFexpress, and CFast cards with configurable inserts.
drk-case-media.longDescription: Modular case system to organize and protect SD, CFexpress Type B, and CFast cards. Each case can be configured by capacity and card type, with color-coding and fast identification options for crew or production.
features: Configurable interiors by card type
Compact format built for flightcases
Color-coding option for production or cameras
Firm closure, easy to open with gloves

technicalSpecs.label: Compatible with
technicalSpecs.value: SD, CFexpress B, and CFast cards

technicalSpecs.label: Tested models
technicalSpecs.value: Sony Tough CFexpress B, Angelbird, ProGrade SD

technicalSpecs.label: Color
technicalSpecs.value: Charcoal black with optional interior colors

drk-hood-sh7.name: Hood for Atomos Shinobi 7"
drk-hood-sh7.shortDescription: Custom-fit hood for the Atomos Shinobi 7" monitor, with precise snap-on fit and no adhesives.
drk-hood-sh7.longDescription: Hood designed specifically for the Atomos Shinobi 7" monitor. Improves outdoor visibility and adds an extra layer of protection against bumps and scratches. The snap-on system requires no adhesives or modifications to the monitor.
features: Tailored design for Shinobi 7"
Mechanical fit, no adhesives
Better readability outdoors
Adds extra screen protection
drk-hood-sh7.notes: Currently in use in rental environments.

drk-honeycomb-v1s.name: Honeycomb for Godox V1s
drk-honeycomb-v1s.shortDescription: Honeycomb for the Godox V1s flash with a pressure-fit system, no magnets or adhesives. 40° beam angle, other angles available on request.
drk-honeycomb-v1s.longDescription: Honeycomb designed specifically for the round head of the Godox V1s flash. The pressure-fit system avoids magnets or adhesives, ensuring secure attachment even in fast-paced shoots. It narrows the beam angle to 40°, adding control, preventing spill, and improving directionality for portrait and product work. Built from heat- and impact-resistant material for intensive use in studios and on set.
features: Compatible with Godox V1s
Pressure-fit system, no magnets or adhesives
40° beam angle (other angles on request)
Lightweight and heat-resistant material
Improves light control and direction
Prevents spill and unwanted reflections

technicalSpecs.label: Tested models
technicalSpecs.value: Godox V1s and V1 for Sony

drk-honeycomb-v1s.notes: Tested and validated for portrait sessions and indoor shoots.

drk-case-media-system.name: Modular card case system
drk-case-media-system.shortDescription: Modular case for SD, CFexpress A, CFexpress B, and CFast cards. Fully configurable interiors.
drk-case-media-system.longDescription: The DRK-CASE MEDIA is a modular case system to organize and protect SD, CFexpress Type A, CFexpress Type B, and CFast cards. The outer shell is always the same: compact, rugged, and designed to fit easily into flightcases and tech bags. The interior is 100% configurable to the needs of each crew, rental house, or production. It can be built with any card mix, including hybrid formats or camera-specific layouts.
features: Configurable interiors for SD, CFexpress A, CFexpress B, and/or CFast
Modular system to adapt to any combination
Secure closure, optionally magnetic
Compact, impact-resistant outer shell
Designed for flightcases and on-set use
Option for color-coding or engraving for production
'Custom' version for special cards or non-standard quantities

technicalSpecs.label: Compatible with
technicalSpecs.value: Mixed layouts for SD, CFexpress A/B, and CFast

technicalSpecs.label: Tested models
technicalSpecs.value: Sony FX3/FX6 media kits, Blackmagic, Canon C70

drk-case-media-system.notes: Designed as a single system. Interior variants can be created on demand per camera.

drk-merch-pro.name: Functional, custom merch for rentals and production companies
drk-merch-pro.shortDescription: Keychains, tools, and accessories customized with your logo: useful merch designed for technicians, not to be forgotten in a drawer.
drk-merch-pro.longDescription: DRK MERCH PRO is a line of functional merchandise designed for rentals, production companies, and film schools that want to give away something genuinely useful. It is not decorative merch: these are practical pieces created by technicians for day-to-day use on set. Tool keychains for 1/4'' screws, ID plates, custom mounts, quick tools, or accessories with your team’s logo. Everything is built to order and can adapt to any workflow.
features: 1/4'' and 3/8'' tool keychains customized with logo
Mini tools for camera and accessories
Useful pieces for rental with engraved or integrated logo
Fully customized design for crew, production company, or school
Robust build with technical materials
Color-code options by department

technicalSpecs.label: Compatible with
technicalSpecs.value: Customization for camera and rental kits

technicalSpecs.label: Tested models
technicalSpecs.value: FX3/FX6, ENG sound kits, rental flightcases

technicalSpecs.label: Material
technicalSpecs.value: Depends on the piece: TPU, PA12, light aluminum

technicalSpecs.label: Color
technicalSpecs.value: Black base with corporate color options

drk-merch-pro.notes: Open project: any small part can become functional merch with the client’s logo.

drk-nato-150.name: NATO rail 150mm for cameras and accessories
drk-nato-150.shortDescription: 150mm NATO rail designed for Sony FX3/FX30, lightweight, rigid, and printed in PAHT-CF to support professional accessories.
drk-nato-150.longDescription: 150mm NATO rail originally designed for Sony FX3/FX30 but adaptable to any camera or configuration. Made in PAHT-CF to deliver stiffness, stability, and precise tolerance with standard NATO clamps. Ideal for mounting handles, articulating arms, monitors, audio receivers, or any on-set accessory. Lightweight format without resonance, ready to work on set, gimbals, and handheld cameras.
features: 150mm length compatible with compact rigs
Technical PAHT-CF material: strong, rigid, and temperature stable
Tight tolerances for standard NATO clamps
Compatible with FX3/FX30 and adaptable to any camera
Low weight without sacrificing stiffness
Perfect for handles, monitors, and audio accessories

technicalSpecs.label: Compatible with
technicalSpecs.value: Standard NATO clamps and FX3/FX30 rigs

technicalSpecs.label: Tested models
technicalSpecs.value: Sony FX3/FX30 with SmallRig and Tilta

drk-nato-150.notes: Also available in custom lengths on request. Future compatibility with universal cheese plates, ARRI systems, and hybrid mounts — in development.

drk-hinge-ls.name: Replacement hinge for Lastolite frames
drk-hinge-ls.shortDescription: Replacement hinge for Lastolite folding panels, with reinforced thread and fit compatible with the original frames.
drk-hinge-ls.longDescription: Replacement part designed to substitute the original hinge of Lastolite kits (reflectors, panoramic panels, and folding backgrounds). Made from durable material with robust threading, it ensures a firm, long-lasting connection between frame segments. Perfect for rentals or crews that frequently use Lastolite panels and need to keep them in perfect condition without buying entire frames.
features: Full compatibility with Lastolite frames (left/right hinge)
Reinforced thread, more durable than the original
Tight fit, tolerances tested in rental environments
Impact- and torsion-resistant material
Ideal as a quick replacement for damaged kits
drk-hinge-ls.notes: Also available in packs of 2, 4, or 8 units for rental maintenance.
